page.title: 20THE SECONDARY SCHOOL
page.content: When children reach the age of 11 years, they leave our primary school in{Earith}for a large{comprehensive}in {Ramsey,}10 miles away. A lot of things change in their lives. They can no longer{walk}to school, but they have to get up early in order to catch the {school bus.}It leaves the village at 8:00am. and returns at 4:45pm. It is a much{longer day.}The{top junior class went along for a{visit}to find out just how different things would be. Everybody was anxious. The first thing we all noticed was the{immense size}of the building. It was{huge.}We were all bound to get lost! We all noticed their{uniforms; purple blazers, grey {trousers or skirts}and a{tie.}There would be so many names to learn. We would no longer have just one class {teacher}but{several!}More{homework!}We will certainly have so much to learn.
